prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a smooth body and vibrant colors.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a mollusk with unique patterns and colors.
Imagine a creature that thrives in wetlands, showcasing soft pink and brown hues.
Generate a Pokemon that has a rounded shape and is known for its calm demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon with distinct features that make it stand out in a grassy habitat.
Make a Pokemon that is both adorable and effective in battle, featuring aquatic traits.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies a blend of earthy and aquatic environments.
